data.title: B10,000 handouts fail to reach 44,000 recipients
data.description: The government was unable to transfer 10,000-baht cash  handouts  to nearly 44,000 people as they have yet to register a  PromptPay  application or failed to provide a valid link to their account, according to Deputy Finance Minister Julapun Amornvivat.

data.title: Thaksin ‘paid for entire hospital stay’
data.description: Former prime minister  Thaksin Shinawatra  paid 8,500 baht a night for his room, along with all other medical expenses, for the entire six-month period that he stayed at  Police General Hospital , an inquiry heard on Friday.

data.title: Social media activist faces arrest for false iCon story
data.description: The Criminal Court on Friday approved an arrest warrant for a social media activist for making false statements about a  cryptocurrency  transaction allegedly linked to the founder of  The iCon Group , the direct sales company accused of operating a  pyramid scheme.

data.title: Thai and Chinese deputy commerce ministers pledge closer cooperation
data.description: Napintorn and Tang laud success in e-commerce cooperation

data.title: ONE Championship: Panpayak’s cardio ‘getting better’ says coach as next fight is confirmed
data.description: Panpayak Jitmuangnon’s cardio is “getting better” says coach Leo Elias, with their return to ONE Championship action confirmed.

data.title: Bangkok governor’s push to settle BTSC debt gets council’s approval
data.description: City council approves governor’s bid to withdraw 14.55 billion baht from the city’s funds to settle BTS Green Line debts

data.title: PTT, FTI set stage for Thailand’s clean energy future at annual forum
data.description: Energy experts discussed global challenges, including climate change and geopolitical tensions, while highlighting Thailand’s commitment to eco-friendly solutions

data.title: Thailand and the EU Strengthen Bonds Through the PCA
data.description: The Partnership and Cooperation Agreement (PCA) marks a new chapter for Thailand and the EU, as they join forces to build a future of shared success and sustainable growth.

data.title: A pledge to enhance disaster preparedness across Asia Pacific 2 decades after tsunami
data.description: Asia-Pacific region bolsters warning systems and disaster preparedness

data.title: Second Australian dies after Laos poisoning
data.description: A second Australian teenager has died of suspected  methanol  poisoning, bringing to six the number of  foreign tourists  who have died after apparently drinking  tainted alcohol  in Laos.

data.title: Bitkub Partners with ETHGlobal for Bangkok Blockchain Hackathon
data.description: Bitkub Capital Group Holdings Ltd. has solidified its position as a blockchain technology leader in Southeast Asia through a strategic partnership with ETHGlobal, a world-renowned community advancing Ethereum blockchain development. This collaboration supported DEVCON 7, held from 12–17 November 2024 at the Queen Sirikit National Convention Center in Bangkok, which welcomed over 20,000 global developers, researchers, and blockchain enthusiasts.

data.title: Discover Over 30,000 Roses at Eternal Bloom
data.description: In celebration of the auspicious occasion of His Majesty the King’s 72nd birthday, Flora Park and Rose Park Wang Nam Khiao, in collaboration with Siam Paragon, are hosting a magnificent showcase of Bangkok’s first grand rose display at Siam Paragon—a renowned global destination and a top choice for both Thai and international visitors.

data.title: TOA Unveils 2025 Color Trends with Seamless Synchrony
data.description: TOA Paint (Thailand) Public Company Limited (TOA) has unveiled its 2025 Color Trends, introducing two new color groups under the concept of “Seamless Synchrony.” These trends are designed to connect people, living spaces, and the environment sustainably, affirming TOA’s status as Thailand’s leading provider of eco-friendly construction materials and comprehensive color solutions.

data.title: “Madame Pang Foundation” organizes a charity golf tournament to raise essential funds for ongoing community support
data.description: “Madame Pang Foundation” organized its second charity golf tournament in 2024 to support its comprehensive mission.

data.title: Siam Paragon Celebrates 19th Anniversary with Magical Festivities
data.description: Siam Paragon marks its significant 19th anniversary with  “Siam Paragon 19th Anniversary: The Magical Celebration,”  reaffirming its status as a global and luxury destination for both Thai and international visitors. Running from 2-10 December 2024, this grand celebration invites all to enjoy an array of exciting events, exclusive promotions, and commemorative gifts.

data.title: Paetongtarn welcomes court victory with renewed commitment to goals
data.description: PM expresses relief after the charter court rejected a petition against her father and Pheu Thai Party, and says her government is committed to the nation’s progress

data.title: Japanese porn stars charging B670,000 for sex arrested in Hong Kong operation
data.description: Japanese porn stars are among more than 30 people arrested by Hong Kong and Singaporean police in a crackdown on an international prostitution ring that charged as much as HK$150,000 (670,000 baht) for sex.

data.title: Talks with Cambodia could focus only on profit sharing over OCA: PM
data.description: Discussions on the natural gas and oil-rich overlapping claims area in the Gulf of Thailand could shift to profit sharing instead, says the Thai premier

data.title: Constitutional Court rejects petition against Thaksin and Pheu Thai
data.description: Judges cite lack of evidence of attempts to overthrow constitutional monarchy system

data.title: More rain pounding southern provinces
data.description: Heavier rainfall is affecting Thailand

data.title: Why Trump biopic The Apprentice was censored in Hong Kong
data.description: HONG KONG — Controversial Donald Trump biopic  The Apprentice  began showing in Hong Kong cinemas on Thursday - despite an official release date of Nov 28 - but the film had not escaped local censors beforehand.

data.title: Can Cross break the curse?
data.description: There seems to be a recurring curse when it comes to adapting James Patterson

data.title: From fruit to jewels: Nation TV show to turn spotlight on Chanthaburi
data.description: Nation TV’s new series will showcase the eastern province’s unique heritage – from its renowned gemstones and distinct durians to traditional cuisine

data.title: NT Welcomes Global Telecommunications Partners
data.description: National Telecom Public Company Limited (NT), led by Apichart Swankhamthorn, Senior Executive Vice President for Product Market Group, welcomed international telecommunications partners attending the Telecoms World Asia 2024 conference.

data.title: Guru's Weekly Buzz: Nov 22-28
data.description: Guru By Bangkok Post

data.title: Red Cross Fair kicks off Dec 11 at Lumpini Park
data.description: Annual jamboree to mark 101st anniversary with 12 days and nights of festive fun in the green heart of Bangkok

data.title: SBS International Bangkok Opens Near Suvarnabhumi Airport
data.description: The Arthit Ourairat Institution (AOI) proudly announces the opening of its fourth campus, SBS International Bangkok, located in Lat Krabang, conveniently close to Suvarnabhumi Airport. Under the experienced leadership of Neil Crossland, former Deputy Head of School at the British International School Phuket (BISP), SBS International Bangkok offers a comprehensive British international curriculum from kindergarten through to Year 13.

data.title: Thai footballer Alice Sombath makes history with call-up for France
data.description: Right-back, 21, is first player of Thai heritage to be named in French senior squad, capping stellar start to her soccer career

data.title: More tourists visit Koh Samui
data.description: Two cruise liners with over 2,000 tourists have arrived at Koh Samui in Surat Thani, with at least 10 ships scheduled to visit the island until next month.

data.title: UA Combine returns bigger and better than ever before
data.description: Under Armour has brought the UA Combine 2024, powered by Supersports, Southeast Asia

data.title: Big men: Scoring centres are still the NBA's secret sauce
data.description: The more things change in the NBA -- in-season tournament, ever-changing all star game format, etc -- the more things stay the same.

data.title: Vietnam issues disciplinary 'warning' to former parliament chair
data.description: HANOI — Vietnam

data.title: Thaioil Unveils 2025 Strategy, Prioritises Clean Fuel Project
data.description: Thai Oil Public Company Limited (Thaioil) has revealed its 2025 business strategy, focusing on sustainable growth despite anticipated challenges in both domestic and international energy and petrochemical markets. Thaioil remains confident in its long-term growth potential and opportunities, particularly through the expedited management of the Clean Fuel Project (CFP), which will serve as a crucial foundation for strengthening the company and ensuring national energy security.
